tool_description: An API Showing climate changing news around the world
name: Climate Change World News
title: Climate Change World News

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Get News about Climate Change from a specific News Source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-world-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-world-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-world-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-world-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: this endpoint will return back all news about Climate Change from all over the world
